Description:
Lazudi, give you the opportunity to be Secondary Market Area Specialist, and aloud you to handle, your area off plan leads on your own, in order to maximized your profits.Key Responsibilities:Provide exceptional customer service to clients looking to buy, sell, or rent properties.
Build and maintain relationships with clients and property owners.
Create and implement effective marketing strategies to attract new clients and listings.
Research and analyze the real estate market trends and conditions to provide clients with accurate information.
Negotiate deals on behalf of clients and prepare and present offers to property owners.
Ensure that all necessary paperwork and documentation is completed accurately and in a timely manner.Qualifications:At least 1-3 years of experience as a Real Estate Broker/not only in Dubai
Considering also non experience
Strong negotiation and communication skills
Knowledge of the local real estate market and trends
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Ability to work under pressure and meet targets
Valid UAE Driving LicenseSkills
Skills:
Negotiation Skills: The ability to negotiate deals effectively on behalf of clients is a crucial skill for a Real Estate Broker.
Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills are essential for building relationships with clients and property owners and for negotiating deals.
Market Analysis Skills: A Real Estate Broker should have a strong understanding of the local real estate market and trends to provide clients with accurate information.
Sales Skills: The ability to sell properties to potential clients is a key skill for a Real Estate Broker.
Customer Service Skills: Providing exceptional customer service is essential for building relationships with clients and for ensuring client satisfaction.
Salary: Attractive Commission-based, with 50% of sales through company provided leads for the Off Plan Team and Listings for the Secondary Market Team
